articles.author: Zhao Lei
articles.title: Chinese-French-made satellite launched into preset orbit - asianews.network
articles.description: Collaboration to capture and observe gamma-ray bursts—the most distant explosions of stars.
articles.content:
June 25, 2024
SICHUAN – A cutting-edge astronomical spacecraft jointly developed by China and France was launched into its preset orbit on Saturday afternoon to capture and observe gamma-ray bursts … [+4978 chars]
